issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement physical expression for binary expressions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6669](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6669). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement comparison operators (<, <=, >, >=, =, !=) as well as binary operators AND and OR.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6669?focusedCommentId=16936865) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5478
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5478>
